Jailor: Oooooh! She's gonna be one hot boltbomb, if you know what I
mean! Hehehe! Alright, gimme just a few clicks...

He stood up and grabbed a handy stunstick, then started walking to the
recuperation area where Balistica was detained. He entered, hiding the
stick as best as he could.

Jailor: So, gorgeous, you didn't want to join the ranks?

Balistica was still a little stiff. It was no real wonder, though,
with the welcome she had received...

Balistica: You mean that I chose to not kill my brothers and sisters?
Looks like I didn't... And don't go calling me "gorgeous".

Jailor: Well I be callin' you wha'ever I want, ya hear?

He rose the stunstick but was caught by a punch before the blow
landed. Balistica was faster than most bots, and even her movements
reflected that. She grabbed the jailor's arm and broke it off, earning
the stunstick as a reward. Amidst the other's cries of pain, she
struck once with the weapon and shocked him out for a long time.

Balistica: Great... Now I remember why I hate soldiers so much...

She got out of her cell, cluelessly trying to find her way out.
